Okay, so it's quite some time since I downloaded CS:GO and let's just say there isn't a lot that has changed. It's still the same game and the same community. There aren't that many cheaters anymore and that's great. I love to play CS I think it's a really good way to waste some time if you're looking to waste some time without getting bored. But I would say they have to fix the rank system it sucks, to be honest. But overall I think it's a great game.
